body.name: USB C Docking Station Dual Monitor for Dell HP, Quadruple Display Hub Multiple Adapter to 4K HDMI Displayport VGA,3 USB 2.0,100W PD, Thunderbolt Laptop USB C Dock for MacBook,Lenovo,Surface
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Docking Station 4 Monitors Display】: HoDo USB C Docking Station with Dual HDMI 4K (1*60HZ & 1* 30HZ), 1*4K@60HZ DisplayPort, 1*1080P VGA,3* USB 2.0,USB C Power Charging Port (max 100W). ★★ Please Note: on MacOS system, the screens of external monitors are the same, no matter they are displayed in mirror mode or extended mode.

【Docking Station 4K Display Adapter】: The Laptop Docking Station with 4 video output ports: 2 HDMI+DP+VGA, can output up to 4K Dual/Triple Display videos; For quadruple display Dual HDMI, DP, and VGA all are 1080@60Hz. ★★Please make sure your laptop specification support DP1.4 signal output. If the VGA port is connected, it will affect the resolution of all displays up to 1080P only.

【100W USB C PD Charging Port】: Computer Docking Station for Dell Hp laptop supports up to 100W input & 87W(safe)output into your laptop.★★ Please Note: please ensure your laptop's USB C port supports power delivery protocol and please use at least 65W power adapter(not included) when charging with this usb c hub,using a lower wattage power charger may cause a system warning. ★Note: The power cord is not included.

【USB C Hub Multiport Adapter】: This USB C Dock with 3 usb 2.0 ports, allows your conveniently connect keyboard,mouse, usb flash driver, usb c hard disks, transfer speeds up to 480Mbps, USB 2.0 allows you to connect keyboard or mouse without any lag.

【Extensive Compatibility】: This USB C Dongle Adapter specially designed for laptops with Full-featured USB Type-C port (support Display, charging, data transfer protocol), such as Dell XPS13/15/17, Dell latitude 5420/7420, Lenovo Thinkpad, Lenovo Yoga, HP Elitebook 840,HP envy, Surface pro 7 8, MacBook Pro/Air. ❤️If you experience any issues while using this USB C Hub, please feel free to reach out to us, we will solve the problem for you within 24 hours!!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: USB C Docking Station Dual Monitor for HP Dell Lenovo Mac Surface Laptops - 2 HDMI & VGA DP Ports Support Work Simultaneously This HoDo 8 IN 1 Docking Station provides a stable connection and increases the productivity of your device by expanding the female USB C port to multiple possibilities of connectivity. Keep your laptop charging while still providing power to each external device attached. Extensive compatibility meets every need of almost all USB C devices. When using 4 monitors, the connection step is (Failure to follow the correct steps may result in four displays not being displayed at the same time) HDMI1>DP>HDMI2>VGA (The previous video port needs to display successful connection before connecting to the next video port) Laptop Docking Station Setup Steps: Extend mode setting steps for window laptop: Right click desktop>Graphic Setting>Display>Extend Display Mirror mode setting steps for window laptop: Right click desktop>Graphic Setting>Display>MirrorDisplay Extend mode setting steps for Mac OS laptop: Guide:Apple logo system preferences>Display>MirrorDisplay(Yes or NO) Mirror mode setting steps for Mac OS laptop: Guide:Apple logo system preferences>Display>MirrorDisplay(Yes or NO)

Please Check Which Functions Supports By Your Laptop's Built-in USB C Port Before Purchasing!!! Only support Thunderbolt 3/4 or supports video output or DP Alt Mode laptops work with this Docking Station. The incompatible laptops can not use the HDMI/DP/VGA ports Please check which Functions supports by your Laptop's built-in USB C port first, only if your laptop's built-in USB C port is fully funcitonal port which support Data transfer & Video Display & PD charging, you can use the full functions of our docking station. Below types of USB C port are Fully Funcitonal Port: Thunderbolt 3The USB Type C 3.1 Gen 2 with Power Delivery & DisplayPort,USB Type C 3.2 Gen 2 with Power Delivery & DisplayPort If you are not sure which features are supported by the us-c port on your laptop, Please feel free to check with us!!!

Docking Station Multiple Display Modes for Windows & Mac OS Please Note: All MacBook laptop only supports SST mode of Mirror Mode: AA,AAA,AAAA, AAAAAand Extend Mode : AB,ABB,ABBB, ABBBB Not support A-B+C or A-B+C+D.MST Display NOLY supports Windows laptop (A-B+C, A-B+C+D or A-B+C+D+E)For Windows laptop on DP1.2, due to laptop's limited bandwidth, one of the monitors resolution will be lower than 1080P when use 2 HDMI and VGA simultaneously, and the final resolution depends on the specifications of laptop bandwidth,HDMI cable, max resolution of external monitors and the "Displayport" protocol of the usb c port of the laptop.When HDMI and VGA work simultaneously, the resolution of monitors will down to 1080P/60HzPlease check whether the built-in usb c port of your laptop support "Display Port" video output function, if not, then the HDMI,VGA,DP of the hub doesn't work for your laptop.

Compatibility List (Not full List) NOTE： Please ensure that your device has a thunderbolt 3/4 / USB-C 3.1 Gen 2 or USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 that support "Power Delivery&DisplayPort Alt Mode" to support video output. HDMI function needs to confirm if the usb c port of your device supports DisplayPort Alternate Mode. If not sure please check with us. HoDo dokcing station are happy check if this dock is compatible for your device. Two Modes (HDMI 1+HDMI 2) Maximum Resolution for DP 1.4 Win laptop HDMI: 4K@60HzDP: 4K@59Hz Maximum Resolution for Dp 1.2 Win laptop HDMI: 4K@59HzDP: 4K@29Hz Triple Modes (HDMI 1+HDMI 2+DP) Maximum Resolution for DP 1.4 Win laptop HDMI1: 4K@59HzHDMI 2: 4K@29HzDP: 2K@60Hz Maximum Resolution for DP 1.2 Win laptop: HDMI 1: 4K@29HzHDMI 2: 4K@29HzDP: 2K@60Hz Quad Modes (HDMI 1+HDMI 2+VGA+DP) Maximum Resolution for DP 1.4 Win laptop HDMI 1: 1080@60HzHDMI 2: 1080@60HzDP: 1080@60HzVGA: 1080@60Hz Maximum Resolution for DP 1.2 Win laptop: HDMI 1/HDMI 2/DP: 1080@60HzVGA: Lower than 1080P

Enjoy Stable Video With 4K@60Hz Dual 4K vivid DMID output With this macbook air hdmi adapter, you can easily mirror or extend your laptop/smartphone screen with USB C Hub HDMI port and directly stream 4K UHD video/film to a bigger monitor, HDTV, monitor or projector at home or hotel... Super Speed USB 2.0 Ports Transfer large files in second - 480Mbps This Dell xps computer docking station comes with 3 usb 2.0 ports,which allows your to connect usb keyboard, mouse, usb driver, usb hard disks to your laptop with high speed. USB C Power Charging Port Max Power Input Up to 100W Allows you to charging your type c devices at power up to 100W, no need to worry about power storage while connecting multiple peripherals. Notice: USB C PD Charging doesn't works for laptop own a AC charging adapter, those laptop (Dell/HP/ThinkPad...) do not allow 3rd party charger to charge their laptop in other ways. Please note: Power cord is not included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A well rounded docking hub. No USB 3.0 ports(A or C)
reviews.reviewText: There are a lot of USB C docking stations available, and it's nice to have options, especially when different hubs offer different ports and capabilities. But sometimes that can be confusing when ports you think should be present or should work a certain way don't function as expected.So looking from that approach, rather than tell you what the hub has (which you can see by reading the description, I'll point out what it does NOT have. I don't mean for these to be criticisms, I just want to help searchers be sure whether this is or is not the hub they need.1) There is no USB C in port for data. The USB C port that it has is for Power Delivery, to charge the main host and help supply power across all the connections. But if you have a USB C phone, you will not be able to connect it directly to this hub.2) There is no USB 3.0 (or 3.1) type A (the old rectangular USB port). You can connect USB 2.0 devices, but 3.0 and 3.1 devices will only run at much slower 2.0 speeds. This is fine for keyboards, mice, etc...but will be a serious limitation if you want to use a high speed flash drive or external hard drive.I have tested the dual HDMI output and it works on PC. I have a Surface Pro, connected this to the USB C port, and monitors to each HDMI port, and was able to have a 3 screen setup working (Surface screen, + 2 1600x900 monitors.) I also run keyboard and mouse through the hub, and it works great. I saw notes that Mac users may have limitations in the types of screen arrangements they can set up, but I can't speak from experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great docking station, works with dell G15 on multiple displays, I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried connecting my G15 to multiple displays using a few other docking stations in the past, and really didn't have any success with anything but the dell branded dock. This unit is amazing, it worked for my G15 flawlessly without needed to be plugged into a USB-C power supply, which was very unexpected for me! I used it to connect to two monitors, an HP and a Dell monitor with Display Port and HDMI connections, respectively. I then proceeded to stream 3 different videos on the three screens and it played them all without a hitch.I was also able to connect it to my Samsung S20 Ultra and it would have displayed to both monitors if they were the same resolution. It worked for about a minute or two, then one of them went into standby unless I unplugged and re-plugged in the USB-C connector. Haven't done a lot of testing with the phone, but it was interesting to play with and nice tool to keep in the back pocket.I really didn't know what to expect, but this is an awesome docking station. It is a third the size of the dell docking station, and much more aesthetically pleasing. The shell is made of aluminum, and the end caps are plastic. The cord is 12.75" long and is thick, but flexible. It does not feel plastic-y or cheap. Not a lot else I can say about it, other than it just works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality USB-C hub
reviews.reviewText: Nice little portable docking station, the materials feel like good quality. I tried it with Dell and Surface laptops, it works plug-and-play with two monitors (1 HDMI, 1 DisplayPort) extended or duplicated.As noted in the product description all 3 USB-A ports are type 2.0, which is fine for plugging in the receiver for a keyboard or mouse and OK for a USB drive, but data transfer rates are going to be more limited than a hub with USB-A 3.x ports.One thing to watch is that the hub impacts the power supply, so when using a 65W USB-C charger plugged into the power port of the hub, then into a laptop that requires a 65W source you get “weak charge state” and “use the charger supplied with your computer” errors. The laptops do seem to charge, but error messages are certainly a concern. It seems to work fine if you go up one charge rating, i.e., a 65W charger hooked to the hub on a system that takes a 45W OEM charger, so this is something to take into consideration. I have not tested similar portable hubs with power pass-through, so I can't comment if this is typical or unique to this hub. If I test others and find it is not typical I will update this review (and adjust to 4 stars).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Good, Decent Specs for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this USB hub, I got this one specifically because it supports VGA and 4k60hz HDMI. Currently I am only using the VGA for my external monitor but am planning on upgrading to a 4k monitor in the next couple months. The VGA works great, have had no issues with it so far. Also the USB all is working great and the pass through charging works without issue. Compared to other products seems to have good features for the price.Things to note:1) The USB is 2.0 and not 3.0, which is a bit of a bummer although most people would probably never notice the difference, still nice to have.2) Check the specs before buying, this has 2 HDMI ports but one is only at 4k30hz. If you want two monitors at 4k60hz you need to use the DP and HDMI 1 port.3) Check your laptop specs and what it can handle, not all laptops can handle larger monitors especially through the USB C ports.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great as a Docking Station
reviews.reviewText: I stumbled upon this looking for a second docking station to connect my laptop, dual monitors, and USB peripherals into at home. This device is working flawlessly. It's doing the exact same thing as the OEM docking station is doing, without the high cost of an OEM docking station.It's small and dense. Feels well built. Actually takes up significantly less space than the docking station.The graphics are just as good as with the docking station.I'm using it for:1) Powering HP laptop with USB-C (Thunderbolt)2) Dual 27" 1920x1080 monitors using one HDMI and one DisplayPort3) USB Camera/Headset & Phone ChargingThis device is performing wonderfully!Note: This requires a USB-C power supply (not included). My laptop came with a second power cable for travel, which is what I'm using to power this device.Two thumbs up!
